title: Fix chat input styling issues

requirements.text: Remove the unwanted border on the top of the chat input area in the MessageInput component

quotes: the chat input area has border on the top that shouldnt be there

acceptanceCriteria: The top border of the chat input area is no longer visible
Other borders and styling remain intact

requirements.text: Restore the character counter that was accidentally removed from the MessageInput component

quotes: the character counter was removed unexpectedly

acceptanceCriteria: Character counter is visible in the chat input area
Counter accurately displays remaining characters as user types
Counter styling matches the overall design

constraints: Do not modify the existing functionality of the MessageInput component beyond fixing the styling issues
Maintain the current button layout and interaction patterns
nonGoals: Adding new features to the chat input area
